mema prakashanaya purwikawak washayen karunu gananawak sahan karayi. 1949 di kadurata demala janayage purawasi ayithiya ahosi kirime sita me thak merata demala janaya muhuna dun wishama salakim; 1972 saha 1978 wyawastha sampadanaye di demala illim sahamulinma nosalaka harima; deshapalana wisandumak sandaha demala deshapalanaya dakwu ekangathawayan 1959 di saha 1966 di eeka pakshikawa sinhala deshapalanaya wisin katu ga damu andama; 1956, 1958, 1961, 1977, 1981 saha 1983 warshayanhi muda harunu demala wirodhi kolahala; nidahasin pasu uthuru nagenahira jana anupathaya wenas kirima pinisa rajya anugrahayen sinhala janapada athi kirimath yuddhawasanayen pasu militari muhunuwarakin ema kriyadamaya diyath wi thibima yanadiya eewa ya.
